title: Snakes

[?] like a snake in the grass

What thing she's clothing, with once made of blast

Crept upon me like a shadow on a wall

Wouldn't prepare for how happy I would fall

And I say

Oh girl, crawl in between

Don't you know the grass ain't green

Oh girl, step on the scene

Don't you know the word is on me

Smoking mirror, what the spell you have cast

Cruel predictions have outcome the past

The earth is shaking

And the sky's tumbling down (tumbling down)

Shaking my tree till my leaves fall to the ground

And I said fall to the ground

Fall to the ground

Fall to the ground

Fall to the, fall to the, fall to the ground

And I say



Oh girl, step on the scene

Don't you know the word is on me

Don't you know the grass ain't green

Don't you know the word is on me (world is on me)

D-d-d-d-don't you know (don't you know)

Imma, look to the mountains

Look to the mountains

Look to the mountains

Look to the mountains

Look to the mountains
